entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mTls-handshakes-httpsys, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60960
  • Adding a diagnostic mode that turns on more activities in ASP.NET #60956
  • EventCallback HasDelegate=false in InteractiveServer child component from an SSR parent #60954
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60953
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, multiple_queries, tls-handshakes-kestrel #60951
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url, tls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-handshakes-kestrel #60950
  • Perf improvement: caching, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60949

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #60945
  • Perf regression: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #60952
  • Please invite me to the GitHub Organization #60959
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #60947

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Add default implementation to OpenAPI's new Description property to prevent a breaking change #60937
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-16

Closed

    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create project #28437
  • MAUI MAP control - To add new marker with icon #28436
  • maui BackgroundService #28435
  • Custom handler error on iOS - The type 'MyMauiControl.Handlers.CustomEntryHandler' cannot be used as type parameter 'TViewHandler' in the generic type or method 'PropertyMapper<TVirtualView, TViewHandler>'. #28433
  • In the template of CollectionView, the margin settings of the table are displayed inconsistently. #28431

PullRequests

Created

  • Bring back iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation via inheritance #28434
    community ✨
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    community ✨

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated - UITest #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR6
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - UI Test #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android & iOS] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR6

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using [LibraryImport] with a generic delegate parameter (e.g. Func<int, int>) causes an exception #113590
  • Memory allocations in desktop AOT builds when using Marshal.SizeOf<T>() #113589
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on [FromKeyedServices]? #113585
  • Error when trying to implement the JsonSerializerContext and the JsonSerializable #113584
  • Add back `LambdaExpression.CompileToMethod()` #113583
  • Vector128 and Vector256 Shuffle produces unexpected asm #113582
  • [API Proposal]: `ComWrappers` API to only check for an existing RCW #113581
    Future
  • [wasm] SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http2.SendAsync_ReuseRequestInHandler_ResetsHeadersForEachReuse test failure #113580

Closed

  • JIT: Bad result with vector argument #113488
    10.0.0
  • Does System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener support Multipath TCP? #41434

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset ZLibStreamHandle when parsing concatenated GZip streams #113587
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Mark cloned loops as cold #113579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update unmanaged signatures to match managed QCall signatures. #113578
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.88, windows: 134.0.6998.89 #113577
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • JIT: fix issue in cloning loops with trys in handlers #113586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Ensure `fgTryMorphStructArg` morphs created trees #113496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update llvm-libunwind to 20.1.0 #113513
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve support for 512-bit Vector<T> #111472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix AcquireCredentialHandle parameter lifetime #113540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable SendAsync_ReuseRequestInHandler_ResetsHeadersForEachReuse on WASM #113543
    area-System.Net.Http
  • LoongArch is a NEW ISA which is different from MIPS #113564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SafeFileHandle.ThreadPoolValueTaskSource made ligher by one field #113435
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Switch to AwesomeAssertions #113425
    needs-area-label
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant nullable annotation #113550
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
